titles.title: Muscle Shoals National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
Muscle Shoals National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to reauthorize the Muscle Shoals National Heritage Area in the State of Alabama, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Muscle Shoals National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2036 the authority for the provision of financial assistance to the Muscle Shoals National Heritage Area in Alabama.
